SEARCH
Package Server.Models

Class Borrow

java.lang.Object
Server.Models.Borrow
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Borrow extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a borrowing record with details such as borrow ID, ISBN, user ID, duration, start date, end date, status, and color. This class implements Serializable to allow borrow objects to be serialized.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Borrow

      public Borrow(int idBorrow, String isbn, String idUser, int duration, Date start_date, Date end_date, int status)
      Constructs a new Borrow with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      idBorrow - the unique ID of the borrow record
      isbn - the ISBN of the borrowed book
      idUser - the ID of the user who borrowed the book
      duration - the duration of the borrow in days
      start_date - the start date of the borrow
      end_date - the end date of the borrow
      status - the status of the borrow
